<page title>: Allen Bradley 2711 T9A2 F PanelView 900 Monochrome Touch Terminal DH 485 9" | eBay
description: Allen-Bradley 2711-T9A2 PanelView 900 Monochrome Terminal 9-inch, Touch Screen, DH-485 Communication, 100-240V AC Power, Series F
miscellaneous: Allen-Bradley 2711-T9A2 PanelView Standard terminal is panel mount pixel graphic display device that offer touch screen operator input. The 2711-T9A2 is 9-inch monochrome flat panel which is designed for minimal installation depth with maximum viewing angles.
specifications: Allen-Bradley 2711-T9A2 PanelView 900 Mono Terminal, Display Description: AC Gas Plasma; Display Area (WxH): 210 x 131 mm (8.27 x 5.17 in); Resolution: 640 x 400; Backlight: Field replaceable; Real-time Clock: Battery-back clock time stamps critical data; Application Software: PanelBuilder32; Application Memory: 310K Application Runtime; 1008K Flash (application objects + text + bitmaps); ATA Memory Card: Supported; Communication Ports: DH-485; Input Voltage: 85-264VAC, 47-63 Hz.
